tool_description: Analyzes work orders to determine priority levels based on safety, business impact, and urgency factors.

work_order_id.description: Unique identifier of the work order to assess

safety_impact.description: Safety impact level: none, low, medium, high, critical

business_impact.description: Business operations impact: none, low, medium, high, critical

asset_criticality.description: Asset criticality rating: low, medium, high, critical

deadline_required.description: Whether the work has a specific deadline requirement

error_messages: Work order not found: The provided work_order_id does not exist.
Invalid impact level: Use one of [none, low, medium, high, critical] for safety_impact and business_impact.
Invalid criticality rating: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical] for asset_criticality.
Assessment already exists: This work order has already been prioritized.
usage: Provide work_order_id and impact assessments. The tool calculates priority score and assigns priority level for scheduling and resource allocation.

priority_level.description: Assigned priority level: P1-Critical, P2-High, P3-Medium, P4-Low
